CustomField.description: A user-displayable string describing the verification state for this Company Info. For example, if a document is uploaded and the picture is too fuzzy, this may say “Identity document is too unclear to read”.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A user-displayable string describing the verification state for this Company Info. For example, if a document is uploaded and the picture is too fuzzy, this may say “Identity document is too unclear to read”.
CustomField.label: Verification Details
